Key Match Events: Anthony Davis dominated with 31 points and 14 rebounds.
Dalton Knecht had 27 points, seven rebounds, and five 3-pointers as a starter.
LeBron James had 21 points, seven rebounds, and five assists.
Brandon Ingram led the Pelicans with 32 points.
The Pelicans were without key players like Zion Williamson, Jordan Hawkins, Dejounte Murray, CJ McCollum, and Herbert Jones.
The first quarter was a back-and-forth affair, ending with the Pelicans leading 30-21.
Jaylen Nowell contributed 11 points in the second quarter, helping the Pelicans to a 56-46 lead at halftime.
The Lakers edged ahead in the third quarter, finishing up 75-71.
The Lakers secured a dramatic 104-99 victory with clutch defense and free throws by Dalton Knecht.
